channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Voici ce que vous devez absolument activer si vous êtes chez Free : la « refonte » 3G ne passent pas sur certains téléphones
item.description: Votre téléphone affiche "4G", vos données fonctionnent, mais vos appels coupent ou n'aboutissent jamais ? Ne cherchez pas, ce n'est pas une panne temporaire. C'est structurel. Free est en train de transformer son réseau, et si votre smartphone n'est pas prêt, vous risquez bien plus qu'une conversation manquée.

item.title: Another image of the DJI Osmo Pocket 4 leaks — and it could come with a mysterious new accessory
item.description: We've got another sign of the DJI Osmo Pocket 4 and something called the DJI Osmo FrameTap.

item.title: 25 Work From Home Gift Ideas
item.description: Upgrade your loved one’s home office with these picks that make every day a little easier—and a little more fun.

item.title: Taking too many photos this year? Get Google's cloud storage for half price to keep them safe - or check out some of these other great deals
item.description: If you'll be clogging up your camera roll with too many family videos this Christmas, check out this Google Cloud deal.

item.title: Be confident online with 30% off at ESET with our exclusive code
item.description: Save up to 30% on ESET Home Security Essential, Premium, and Ultimate with our exclusive code

item.title: Cette Power Bank de 22.5 W perd deux euros chez Xiaomi et des écouteurs filaires sont offerts
item.description: Xiaomi a sorti une petite power bank de poche qui dispose de nombreuses qualités dont trois ports de charge de 22,5 W et une autonomie de 10 000 mAh. Sur le site de la marque chinoise, elle passe de 14,99 euros à 12,99 euros et des écouteurs filaires sont offerts.

item.title: US bans former EU Commissioner and others over social media rules
item.description: The Trump administration has issued travel bans that prohibit five European tech researchers, including one former EU Commissioner, from entering the United States. “For far too long, ideologues in Europe have led organized efforts to coerce American platforms to punish American viewpoints they oppose. The Trump Administration will no longer tolerate these egregious acts of extraterritorial censorship,” said US Secretary of State Marco Rubio.That official is Thierry Breton, the former European Commissioner for Internal Markets and Digital Services, who Sarah Rogers called the “mastermind” of t...

item.title: The five-star JBL Charge 6 drops to its lowest-ever price on Amazon
item.description: The JBL Charge 6 is now available at a record-low price of $129.95, thanks to a limited-time deal at Amazon.

item.title: This Switch 2 Joy-Con replacement was already my most anticipated accessory — and now it’s getting two new versions plus cool pre-order bonuses
item.description: Two new versions of my most anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 accessory were just revealed.

item.title: Surprise last-minute MacBook Air 15 deal at Best Buy drops latest model down to new record-low price
item.description: You can bundle together a trade-in rebate and an upfront discount to get a MacBook Air 15 for just $299 at Best Buy today.

item.title: The best streaming deals: Get 50 percent off MasterClass subscriptions, plus save on Starz, Audible, Crunchyroll and others
item.description: If you’ve been shocked by how much you spend on streaming services lately, you’re not alone. Companies like Netflix, Disney, HBO Max and others have been consistently raising prices to the point where you may question if streaming is even worth it anymore. We at Engadget still think it is, but we also think you should be smart with your money — and that’s where streaming deals come in. Yes, it is possible to get discounts on services like Peacock and Paramount+, even if those deals aren’t as common as a sale on AirPods. If you’re looking to save money and still stream all of the content you wa...

item.title: PSA: Please Do Not Buy This Dubious ‘AI Translator’
item.description: We were asked not to write this review for the InnAIO T10, so naturally, we wrote this review.

item.title: Apple’s App Course Runs $20,000 a Student. Is It Really Worth It?
item.description: Apple, Michigan taxpayers, and one of Detroit’s wealthiest families spent roughly $30 million training hundreds of people to build iPhone apps. Not everyone lands coding jobs right away.

item.title: What is the release date for Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 5 on Starz?
item.description: We've reached the halfway point of the Starz series, but when will Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 5 be released?

item.title: Vie numérique | Le Canada entrera dans l’ère des téléphones pliables en 2026
item.description: Les écrans pliables. On en trouve sur des téléphones vendus en Chine et en Europe depuis quelques années. Ils sont toujours très rares au Canada, mais 2026 pourrait changer la donne, maintenant qu’Apple songerait très sérieusement à investir ce marché.

item.title: Tell Me Lies season 3: everything we know so far about the hit show's return to Hulu and Disney+
item.description: Tell Me Lies season 3 arrives on January 13 – here's everything you need to know about the hit Hulu and Disney+ show's return.

item.title: Will it air fry? I've taste-tested 9 Christmas favorites in an air fryer –here are the results
item.description: Is an air fryer really the kitchen gadget panacea? We put it to the test with some Christmas classics.

item.title: Hisense unveils two 4K laser projectors — a 300-inch beast with huge brightness, plus the sequel to the best ultra short throw projector
item.description: Hisense unveils two new 4K laser projectors for images from 65 to 300 inches, including the PX4-Pro UST projector

item.title: Guerre des puces : Washington accuse Pékin de « concurrence déloyale » et promet des nouveaux droits de douane pour… 2027
item.description: Des menaces, mais pas encore d'actes : les États-Unis comptent davantage taxer les semi-conducteurs chinois, mais seulement en juin 2027, en raison de la « concurrence déloyale » de Pékin. La déclaration intervient dans un contexte bien particulier de guerre des semi-conducteurs, mais aussi de trêve commerciale entre les deux puissances.

item.title: Thierry Breton attaqué par l’administration Trump : l’Europe condamne la mesure timidement
item.description: La tension entre l’Europe et les États-Unis concernant la régulation de la tech a franchi un nouveau palier. Désormais, le gouvernement américain s’en prend directement aux régulateurs européens. L'Europe condamne la mesure... tout en demandant des explications.

item.title: Asus ROG Strix : ce laptop gaming perd 240 € et connaît son prix le plus bas depuis le lancement en mars dernier
item.description: Avec sa RTX 5070 Ti, l'Asus ROG Strix saura faire tourner tous les plus gros jeux du marché sans aucun souci. Chez Amazon, il perd 240 euros et tombe à 1 759 euros, son prix le plus bas depuis le lancement.

item.title: The Best Desk Accessories (2025)
item.description: Brighten up your bare desk with these cute, fidgety, functional, and stylish desk accessories.

item.title: I've DJed on mixers worth thousands — but this super-cheap DJ controller is my Christmas pick for music lovers
item.description: I stepped away from my pro-grade DJ setup to check out this cheap controller from the brand formerly known as Pioneer DJ.

item.title: 4 clever games you’ll want to play over the holidays
item.description: Are the gifts and family time behind you? No? Either way, decompress with these smart games. You came, you ate, you sat through Uncle Bob’s crass jokes. You’ve earned yourself some alone time.

item.title: What stores are open on Christmas Eve 2025? Holiday hours for Walmart, Target, CVS, and more
item.description: You can trade stocks and get money from the bank on the day before Christmas, but many popular retailers will have reduced hours. The holiday season is merry, bright, and hectic. It’s hard to cram every moment of cheer into just four weeks and keep your sanity.

item.title: Battlefield, EA Sports FC, Les Sims : ces franchises appartiennent quasiment à l’Arabie Saoudite
item.description: L'éditeur de Battlefield et EA Sports FC acte un peu plus son passage sous pavillon saoudien après le vote favorable de ses investisseurs. Ne reste plus que la validation des autorités de la concurrence.

item.title: Sony WF-1000XM6 earbuds seem to have leaked again — this time with a possible release date hint
item.description: 2026 looks set to be the year of XM6 – could Sony be preparing to launch its latest earbuds at CES?

item.title: Suspected DDoS attack takes France’s post office offline
item.description: Multiple post office sites and services are inaccessible as teams scramble to restore them.

item.title: Scared RAM price hikes will make your new PC a lot pricier? 'BYO RAM' is Maingear's answer – meaning you provide your own memory
item.description: There's a PC building party going on, just Bring Your Own RAM…

item.title: 40 To sur bande magnétique : Fujifilm annonce ses nouvelles cartouches LTO-10, mais pour quoi faire ?
item.description: Le japonais Fujifilm a annoncé de nouvelles cartouches LTO-10 à bande magnétique. Conçues pour stocker jusqu'à 40 To de données, ces dernières s'appuient sur une technologie un tantinet archaïque. Mais alors à quoi servent-elles ?

item.title: The Night Before Tech Christmas — a very modern holiday fable
item.description: A modern, digital take on a holiday classic

item.title: The Age of the All-Access AI Agent Is Here
item.description: Big AI companies courted controversy by scraping wide swaths of the public internet. With the rise of AI agents, the next data grab is far more private.

item.title: How to watch ​Royal Carols: Together At Christmas 2025 — free streams from anywhere
item.description: Hosted by Catherine, Princess of Wales at Westminster Abbey, here's how to watch ​the Royal Carols: Together At Christmas 2025 carol service for free.

item.title: You better watch out! 3 holiday scams to be aware of
item.description: 'Tis the season (to be cyber-savvy)!

item.title: I played Yakuza Kiwami on Nintendo Switch 2, and the Dragon of Dojima’s debut feels as good as ever
item.description: Yakuza Kiwami feels fantastic to play on Nintendo Switch 2, with smooth gameplay, good visuals, and convenient on-the-go capability.
